Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
19.02.2014 SH SCR18704 Strings to compare with SECA_SUBJECT are now fetched from CODX, instead of hardcoded strings
15.08.2013 SH SCR18341 Added group by SCEA_EMAILADDRESS, SCEA_SUBJECT, SCEA_MESSAGEBODY handling
to avoid email delivery to the same email address with the same contents
07.05.2013 GB SCR18127 Extended range for get the CODX data with CODX_NUMBERA20 = V.REGION
22.03.2013 GB SCR18035 Added the task Select CODX where values of text are updated
30.01.2013 SH SCR17917 Changed and extended update for v.MESSAGE (new field SREG_NEWAPPROVEDINVOICESTEXT)
31.07.2012 SH SCR17478 Extended email delivery with send to SREG_SERVICE_EMAIL if filled
31.07.2012 SH SCR17477 Removed test stuff (hardcoded updated of PI.SCFH_NO)
15.06.2012 AS/SH SCR#17337 Added cal UFB596 to convert contents of SREG_PASSWORDTEXT and SREG_NEWUSERTEXT from
Unicode (UTF-16LE) to Unicode (UTF-16BE) if programs runs on ISeries.
12.06.2012 SH SCR17337 Changed attribute of v.PASSWORD and v.MESSAGE from Alpha to Unicode
01.06.2012 GB SCR17337 Rebuilt value of update the V.MESSAGE. Used call the GM102UC instead the GM102
14.05.2012 GB SCR17337 Built value of the V.MESSAGE
-- Variables used only for calculation v.DEBC_NO and v.SUPPLIER_NAME
-- if SCEA_BUYERID <> blank set V.REGION = SBUY_SREG_ID (SBUY_BUYER = SCEA_BUYERID)
-- if SCEA_SUPPLIERID <> blank set V.REGION = SBUY_SREG_ID (SBUY_ADMNO = DEBC_ADMNO, SBUY_CLNTNO = DEBC_CLNTNO (DEBC_NO =
-- SCEA_SUPPLIERID))
-- Determine email address
-- Prepare email message
... output to jobjouranl for testing purposes
-- Fetch email subject/message from database
... PASSWORD HAS BEEN RESET
... USER HAS BEEN CREATED
... NEWLY APPROVED INVOICES AVAILABLE FOR FUNDING
... NEW INELIGIBLE INVOICES UPLOADED
... UPLOAD REQUIRES APPROVAL
if program runs on AS/400 we need to swap bytes in Unicode data to convert UTF-16 LE to UTF-16 BE
On WIndows we can use it as is
